# Data.SearchOptions

**Type Alias**

Options that control a data search operation.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias SearchOptions = NSData.SearchOptions
```

## Related Documentation

- **NSData.SearchOptions**: Options for method used to search data objects.

## Finding Bytes

- **range(of:options:in:)**: Finds the range of the specified data as a subsequence of this data, if it exists.

items.description: Options for method used to search data objects.
